title: Olay Moisturizing Lotion, Sensitive Skin, 6-Ounce (Pack of 2)
description: If you have sensitive skin, you need a daily moisturizer you can trust to condition gently and leave your skin softer, smoother and more supple. Olay Moisturizing Lotion for Sensitive Skin was designed by Olay skincare experts to soothe dryness and provide lasting hydration. This gentle moisturizer is 100% fragrance-free and color-free. It contains aloe and chamomile to help you maintain a more youthful appearance. The sensitive skin formula is light, non-greasy and non-comedogenic, which means it won't clog your pores. Just smooth onto your face and neck every day, and let Olay's dermatologically tested lotion go to work. With Olay Moisturizing Lotion for Sensitive Skin, taking care of your skin is simple. Developed by skincare experts and tested by dermatologists, youll get the gentle results you need without going through any unnecessary steps.

title: Clean & Clear Clear Advantage Acne Spot Treatment, 0.75 Ounce
description: Clean & clear advantage acne spot treatment. This treatment contains breakthrough technology that actually dissolves oil and allows the maximum strength acne medicine to penetrate into your pores. This formula works fast to reduce the visible signs of acne.
